replies.author: zqfzqf
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule keepInventory true
你站在哪个地图打这个指令，哪个地图就开启不掉落了

replies.author: 下面好舒服
replies.txt_content:
死亡不掉落指令 /gamerule keepInventory true
单人也可以用

replies.author: aizhuzhu
replies.txt_content:
可以进入游戏后，选择需要防止掉落的世界
然后输入/gamerule keepInventory true
就可以了求最佳 谢谢
